divs: sighting detailsdriving on 422 east bound @7:55 am on 8\22\11 i spotted in the sky a very bright reflection from what i thought was an airplane. it was round an bright and then it simply vanished. i kept looking but there was no airplane in the area. then it appeared again slightly to the left of where it originally appeared. i was looking right at it and it disappeared again like it just all of the sudden became invisible. then briefly, there was a static sound emitted from my car speakers. i thought i was just seeing things but as i was coming around the bed from oaks heading into trooper i saw it again this time over the valley forge area. same thing...bright light about the size of a penny from my view on the road, and then gone. again i looked for a plane but there was no plane. i am not a big believer in ufos but what i experienced today has really baffled me. when i got to work i googled ufo and 422 and to my surprise i happened upon a recent article about a sighting off of 422 in the same area a few weeks ago. so...i figured this would be worth reporting as well.
trends: there have been no other sightings in collegeville\oaks
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Bright Disappearing lights in the sky over 422
